## Writing ESRI files - stored in hidden folder (localdrive)

#### Police violence data - specific to case studies
```{r}
getwd()
library(here)
st_write(ct_encounters, here("localdrive/ct_encounters.shp"))
st_write(ct_mpv_polkill, here("localdrive//ct_mpv_polkill.shp"))
st_write(ct_wpdata, here("localdrive/ct_wpdata.shp"))
```


```{r}
getwd()

         driver = "ESRI Shapefile")
```
